LayoutXML:
<layout>
  <tabs>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Summary"></lang>
      </text>
      <section>
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Calendar Information"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_DUEDATE" fieldtype="8">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Due Date"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_DUETIME" fieldtype="12">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Time"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_DURATION" fieldtype="1">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Duration"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_LOCATION" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Location"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_PRIORITY" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Priority"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_STATUS" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Status"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_PERSONAL" fieldtype="10">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Is Private"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_PARTICIPANTS" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Participants"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_SUBJECT" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Subject"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_INVITEES" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Invitees"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_DETAILS" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="9">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Details"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section containscustominfo="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Classification Information"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_ASSIGNEDTO" fieldtype="1">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Assigned To"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_HIGHLIGHT" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Highlighted Color"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_RELATEDTYPE" fieldtype="1">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related Type"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_RELATEDTO" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related To"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_CONTACT" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Contact"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_STATUSCODE" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Status Code"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_PARTNER_ACCOUNT" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Partner ##Account##"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_PARTNER_CONTACT" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Partner ##Contact##"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_ACCOUNTNAME" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Account## Name"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_TYPE" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Appointment## Type"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_RESOURCE" colspan="3" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Resources"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ACT_ATTACHMENT" colspan="3" fieldtype="19">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Attachments"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
  </tabs>
</layout>
